publications.bio: The Advocate promotes the dissemination of literature that examines youth-related issues with the goal of encouraging youth advocacy in local and federal politics.
publications.bioShort: Encouraging political advocacy by examining issues relevant to college students
publications.name: The Advocate

publications.bio: Student-run entertainment and media organization dedicated exclusively to Cornell University Athletics.
publications.name: Big Red Sports Network

publications.bio: The Cornell Claritas is an ecumenical, interdenominational Christian publication that was founded on the hope of starting thoughtful Christian conversations within the academic community.
publications.name: Cornell Claritas

publications.bio: We are a group of passionate food enthusiasts who come together to publish a diversity of recipes, articles and stories.
publications.bioShort: Recipes, stories, and articles from group of passionate food enthusiasts
publications.name: Crème de Cornell

publications.bio: Guac is an award-winning travel publication run by an interdisciplinary group of students at Cornell University.
publications.bioShort: Celebrating cultural diversity and view the world with an open mind
publications.name: Guac Magazine

publications.bio: Takes fresh from the sticky part of our rejected article pile.
publications.bioShort: News published with the utmost regard for veracity and originality
publications.name: CU Nooz

publications.bio: The Cornell Review is an independent newspaper published by students of Cornell University in Ithaca, New York.
publications.bioShort: One of the leading college conservative publications in the United States
publications.name: The Cornell Review

publications.bio: As Cornell’s multimedia powerhouse, Slope Media Group is a leader in Cornell-related media and entertainment, delivering a creative, student perspective on everything that matters to the Big Red community.
publications.bioShort: Your daily fix of Cornell buzz
publications.name: Slope Media

publications.bio: We created the review to provide a forum for the exchange of these ideas.
publications.bioShort: An open platform for scholarly writing, critical thinking, and reasoned debate
publications.rssName: The Undergraduate Law & Society Review at Cornell
publications.name: The Undergraduate Law and Society Review at Cornell

publications.bio: Thread Magazine is an independent student publication and the only fashion, lifestyle, and art magazine at Cornell.
publications.bioShort: The only fashion, lifestyle, and art magazine at Cornell.
publications.name: Thread Magazine

publications.bio: Logos is the undergraduate philosophy journal  at Cornell University. It is today among the leading publications of its kind in the United States, soliciting submissions from undergraduates around the world.
publications.bioShort: The undergraduate philosophy journal at Cornell University.
publications.name: Logos Magazine

publications.bio: Cornell Data Journal is an online investigative journalism publication featuring data visualization, data communication, and interdisciplinary research pieces.
publications.bioShort: Offering data-driven perspectives on current events, academics, politics, and beyond.
publications.name: Cornell Data Journal

publications.bio: A student-run magazine that discusses business issues, trends, and debates among college students and alumni, CBR provides insight into recent events and passes along advice from student entrepreneurs and industry leaders and pioneers.
publications.bioShort: Cornell Business Review is the premier business publication at Cornell University.
publications.name: Cornell Business Review

publications.bio: We are a community of Cornell students who love creating.
publications.bioShort: We are a community of Cornell students who love creating.
publications.name: Cornell Creatives Blog

publications.bio: The 180 is a publication by Hotelies for Hotelies. We aim to not only highlight the culture of Cornell University’s Hotel School through a 180 degree perspective, but to also capsule the community’s memories physically through an annual print.
publications.bioShort: The 180 is a publication by Hotelies for Hotelies.
publications.name: The 180 at Cornell

publications.bio: We are a student-run international affairs magazine that brings together writers, editors and artists to tackle global problems from a variety of perspectives.
publications.bioShort: Global Issues. Complex Challenges. Student Perspectives.
publications.name: The Cornell Diplomat
